definitions: a person or thing that classifies something

examples.text: any proposed filing order will be artificial and must be learned by classifiers and users

shortDefinitions: person or thing that classifies something

definitions: an affix or word that indicates the semantic class to which a noun belongs, typically used in numerals or other expressions of counting, especially in Chinese and Japanese, e.g. head in two head of cattle
shortDefinitions: affix or word that indicates semantic class
